content.html: What is with recruiters trying to add me on LinkedIn but not sending a message? You know you can message me without being connected right, I'm not going to just accept connections from randomers without any context at all.
content.value:
What is with recruiters trying to add me on LinkedIn but not sending a message?

You know you can message me without being connected right, I'm not going to just accept connections from randomers without any context at all.
